name: Face Raiders
description:
Face Raiders is an action-shooter game developed by Nintendo. It came out on 26-02-2011. It was published by Nintendo. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Face Raiders on Nintendo 3DS.
Shinya Takahashi produced the game. Toshiaki Suzuki directed the game. It was scored by Shogo Sakai.
